title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be disabled when there is no project or file selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Right-click anywhere in the Java perspective.
3. Observe that the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled, regardless of the selection.
Expected: The "Build" action should be disabled when there is no project or file selected.
